sourcesContent:
Shipping prices

{{ shipping.type }} {{ shipping.price | currency }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../cart.service'; import { Observable } from 'rxjs'; @Component({ selector: 'app-shipping', templateUrl: './shipping.component.html', styleUrls: ['./shipping.component.css'], }) export class ShippingComponent implements OnInit { shippingCosts!: Observable<{ type: string; price: number }[]>; ngOnInit() { this.shippingCosts = this.cartService.getShippingPrices(); } constructor(private cartService: CartService) {} }
